itunes:title: Lent 2020 Week 1 with John Greco
title: Lent 2020 Week 1 with John Greco
description:
Our She Reads Truth Lent journey begins this week! Raechel, Amanda, and John explore the blessing of a season set aside to focus on the cross and how Lent connects us to believers across the world and down through history. They also begin laying the groundwork for our community's study of Jeremiah and talk about the Old Testament book's important connections to the story of Jesus.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Lent reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on your first She Reads Truth Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-2020-week-1/
